description: Non material amendments to the following:*Window transom height*Core E entrance elevation changes*GRC lintels and panels replaced with contrasting brickwork *GRC canopies replaced with aluminium canopies, vertical elements omitted*Double height railings removed from balconies*GRC balustrade changed to metal railingof Variation of Conditions applications reference 22/3090 dated 31/03/2024 for Variation of condition 2 (approved drawings and documents), condition 4 (wheelchair accessible units), and condition 18 (CHP details) of full planning permission reference 13/1098 dated 10 February 2017, for Demolition of 205 Church Road and proposal of new market square to replace Eric Road. Demolition of 3 storey building to the rear of 203 Church Road and proposal of 34 residential dwellings and ground floor non-residential space (class A1/A3/B1/D1). Stopping up of Eric Road as revised by plans.
site_name: 205-211 ODDS Inc, 235 & Land in Church Road Car Park rear of 205-235 Church Road, London, NW10
